alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; McClain; Pottawatomie (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 9:11PM CDT until June 15 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Cleveland County in central Oklahoma... Western Pottawatomie County in central Oklahoma... West central McClain County in central Oklahoma... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 911 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over southwestern Norman, or 5 miles north of Goldsby, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Southeastern Oklahoma City, Norman, Moore, Shawnee, Newcastle, Tecumseh, Purcell, Noble, Slaughterville, Pink, Goldsby, Cole, Tribbey, Wanette, Etowah, Brooksville, Macomb, Stella, Stanley Draper Lake, and Lake Thunderbird. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows.
